title: Your emails are not sending?
body: 1. Does the Test button works in the Admin > Mail section?
2. Is Mail System setup in /var/www/pterodactyl/.env? Seriously double check this, it could be not.
If you just changed it, run `php artisan config:clear`.
3. Is `pteroq` running with no errors? Check with `systemctl status pteroq`.
4. Are there no spaces in Nickname/First name/Second name/Email?
